import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import Head from 'next/head' import {Row, Col , List ,Icon,Breadcrumb} from 'antd' import Header from '../components/Header' import Author from '../components/Author' import Advert from '../components/Advert' import Footer from '../components/Footer' import '../static/style/pages/index.css' import axios from 'axios' import servicePath from '../config/apiUrl' import Link from 'next/link' const MyList = (list) => { const [ mylist , setMylist ] = useState(list.data) useEffect(()=>{ setMylist(list.data) }) return ( <> List
首页 视频列表
最新日志
} itemLayout="vertical" dataSource={mylist} renderItem={item => (
{item.title}
{item.addTime} {item.typeName} {item.view_content}人
{item.introduce}
 )} />
) } MyList.getInitialProps = async(context)=>{ let id = context.query.id const promise = new Promise((resolve)=>{ axios(servicePath.getListById+id).then( (res)=>resolve(res.data) ) }) return await promise } export default MyList
